function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Thrusting business as usual into overdrive for economic recovery efforts","category":"Wealth production","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Subjectivity in literature selection in critical literature review clr","category":"Education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability of systematic literature review slr to synthesize academic and grey literature not indexed in popular search engines","category":"Education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact analysis using the ipat model","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Panic buying and fragility of the existing supply chain model","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Consumer behavior change leading to panic buying of essential goods","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of recession on r&d","category":"Wealth production","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to travel restrictions and border closures","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited avenues to reduce costs for airports during traffic declines","category":"Transport","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 through international travel","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of noise on exercise rates","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased use of online platforms and digital transformation may lead to excessive screen time and digital exhaustion.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased online orders for food may lead to over-reliance on delivery services and potential food safety risks.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unpredictable changes in trajectory due to social trauma of lockdown and behavioral changes","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases through global interlinkages and interdependencies","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ramping up the uptake of low emission vehicles and constructing more electric car charging points may increase human interactions within urban environments, potentially contributing to the transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Transport","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of proper implementation of digital technologies","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Security vulnerabilities in digital infrastructure","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data privacy and compliance with regulations","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in online purchasing leading to reduced foot traffic in small businesses, impacting their viability","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of focus on pandemic risks in health club facilities","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing and interaction promotion in fitness center design","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of focus on POE studies in the context of management of health club facilities","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Control measures limiting sports activities and services based on COVID-19 risk levels","category":"Sports","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Importance of recording operation, protection measures, signages, and briefings for managing pandemic risks","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate enforcement of social distancing regulations in sports facilities","category":"Sports","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informal and formal interactions among occupants in health club facilities","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fear of shared spaces and lack of confidence among members","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of digital monitoring and management systems may hinder the effective implementation of preventive measures and tracking of facility performance.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High human traffic and social interactions increase the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective occupancy management and monitoring","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Members not pre-booking on the digital calendar","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Masks being taken off during group sessions","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited number of interactions between members allowed","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for virtual training classes and reduced interaction","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of quantifiable measures in the assessment","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consensus on trust in nphi effectiveness","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effectiveness of nphis is challenging to evaluate due to different measures and study types used","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Single studies conducted in specific communities may not provide conclusive evidence of nphi effectiveness","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of bias in comparing outcomes of communities with and without nphis","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inclusion of studies using mathematical modelling for simulations and predictions may present a risk of bias in the review","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of studies targeting specific populations may lead to a limited understanding of the effects of nphis on those analysis.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate data for estimating the effect size","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Majority of studies from a limited number of countries us and china","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Observational quasi-experimental study designs","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in covid-19 indicators during and after lockdown","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Slight effects of lockdown on decreasing case growth decrease in mortality growth rate after lockdown","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"}]}
